metadata.title: CVE-2023-0666 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Due to failure in validating the length provided by an attacker-craftedRTPS packet, Wireshark version 4.0.5 and prior, by default, is susceptibleto a heap-based buffer overflow, and possibly code execution in the contextof the process running Wireshark.

criterions.comment: wireshark package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
